According to legend, this hideously mutated creature is the otherworldly spawn of a wizard's breeding experiment. Double yuck! ---- “All the infections that sun sucks up
From bogs, fens, flats, on Prosper fall and make him
By inch-meal a disease! His spirits hear me
And yet I needs must curse. ”
-William Shakespeare, _The Tempest_, II, 2. 1611.}} ==Useful Info== '''Very ugly things''' are more powerful versions of [[ugly thing]]s: their colors are the same, but they hit harder and have more powerful versions of their lesser kins' elemental attacks, as well as a greater degree of resistance: '''Very Ugly Thing Varieties''' *{{Red|u}} [[File:Very ugly thing.png]] Red: [[Fire]] attack, rF++ *{{White|u}} [[File:Very ugly thing5.png]] White: [[Cold]] attack, rC++ *{{Cyan|u}} [[File:Very ugly thing3.png]] Cyan: [[Electricity]] attack, rElec+ *{{Brown|u}} [[File:Very ugly thing1.png]] Brown: [[Acid]] attack, rAcid+ *{{Green|u}} [[File:Very ugly thing2.png]] Green: [[:Category:Strong_poison_flavour|Strong poison]] attack, rPois+ *{{Magenta|u}} [[File:Very ugly thing4.png]] Purple: Extra damage ==Tips & Tricks== *Like their smaller counterparts, they are faster than most species on foot. If you can't deal with them and an exit isn't near, consider teleporting away. *Very ugly things have 18 [[hit dice]], meaning their elemental attacks (particularly cold ones) will deal extreme damage if you aren't resistant. ==History== *Prior to its removal in [[0.26]], purple very ugly things had [[rot resistance|rRot]].
